name: Stack-Edu
summary:
_âš  Use card with caution_
A curated subset of The Stack v2, focusing on high-quality educational code across 15 programming languages.
size: Approximately 167 million samples, totaling around 1 terabyte.
notes: Developed to enhance the training of small language models like SmolLM2. Due to its substantial size, downloading requires Amazon S3. The dataset was curated using classifiers fine-tuned on code files annotated by Llama3.1-70B-Instruct to assess educational quality.
